00058 void init_movement_ports()
00059 {
00060         DDRA = 0x0F;
00061         PORTA = 0x00;   //stop condition initially
00062         DDRL = 0x18;    //Setting PL3 and PL4 pins as output for PWM generation
00063         PORTL = 0x18;   //PL3 and PL4 pins are for velocity control using PWM
00064         DDRE = 0x00;
00065         PORTE = 0xCF;
00066 }
00067 
00071 void init_timers()
00072 {
00073         TCCR5B = 0x00;
00074         TCCR5A = 0xA9;
00075         TCCR5B = 0x0B;
00076 }
00077 
00081 void left_pos_interrupt_init()
00082 {
00083         cli();                                  //clear global interrupt
00084         EICRB = EICRB | 0x02;   //INT4 set to falling edge 
00085         EIMSK = EIMSK | 0x10;   //enable interrupt INT4 for left position encoder
00086         sei();                                  //enable global interrupt
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00093 void right_pos_interrupt_init()
00094 {
00095         cli();                                  //clear global inetrrupt
00096         EICRB = EICRB | 0x08;   //INT5 set to falling edge
00097         EIMSK = EIMSK | 0x20;   //enable interrupt INT5 for right position encoder
00098         sei();                                  //enable global interrupt
00099 
00100 }

00107 void set_motor_speed(unsigned char left_motor, unsigned char right_motor)
00108 {
00109         OCR5AL = left_motor;
00110         OCR5BL = right_motor;
00111 }

00116 void RIGHT_TURN()
00117 {
00118         PORTA = 0x0A; //hard right
00119 }
00120 
00124 void LEFT_TURN()
00125 {
00126         PORTA = 0x05; //hard left
00127 }
00128 
00132 void FORWARD()
00133 {
00134         PORTA = 0x06; //forward
00135 }
00136 
00140 void REVERSE()
00141 {
00142         PORTA = 0x09; //reverse
00143 }
00144 
00148 void STOP()
00149 {
00150         PORTA = 0x00; //stop
00151 }

00158 void linear_distance_mm(unsigned int dist, short dir)
00159 {
00160         float ReqdShaftCount = 0;
00161         unsigned long int ReqdShaftCountInt = 0;
00162 
00163         ReqdShaftCount = dist/5.338;    //division by resolution to get shaft count 
00164         ReqdShaftCountInt = (unsigned long int) ReqdShaftCount;
00165         
00166         ShaftCountRight = 0;    //initialize shaft count to zero
00167         
00168         if (dir == 0)
00169                 FORWARD();      //move forward
00170         else
00171                 REVERSE();      //move reverse
00172 
00173         while (1)
00174         {
00175                 if (ShaftCountRight > ReqdShaftCountInt)
00176                         break;  //target distance moved
00177         }
00178         STOP();         //stop
00179         
00180         _delay_ms(500);
00181 }
00182 
00188 void rotate_angle_deg(unsigned int angle, short dir)
00189 {
00190         float ReqdShaftCount = 0;
00191         unsigned long int ReqdShaftCountInt = 0;
00192 
00193         ReqdShaftCount = (float)angle/4.090;    //division by resolution to get shaft count
00194         ReqdShaftCountInt = (unsigned int)ReqdShaftCount;
00195         
00196         ShaftCountRight = 0;    //initialize left shaft count to zero
00197         ShaftCountLeft = 0;             //initialize right shaft count to zero
00198 
00199         if (dir == 0)
00200                 RIGHT_TURN();   //right turn
00201         else 
00202                 LEFT_TURN();    //left turn
00203 
00204         while (1)
00205         {
00206                 if ((ShaftCountRight >= ReqdShaftCountInt) || (ShaftCountLeft >= ReqdShaftCountInt))
00207                         break;  //right or left turn completed
00208         }
00209 
00210         STOP();         //stop
00211         _delay_ms(500);
00212 }

00218 void perform_task(char* task)
00219 {       
00220         left_pos_interrupt_init();      //initialize left position interrupts
00221         right_pos_interrupt_init();     //initialize right position interrupts
00222         
00223         int i=0,j=0; char temp[4];
00224         
00225         while (task[i] != '\0')         //not end of string
00226         {
00227                 if (!((task[i]<=90 && task[i]>=65) || (task[i]<=122 && task[i] >=97)))  //numbers
00228                 {
00229                         temp[j++] = task[i++];
00230                         continue;
00231                 }
00232                 else
00233                 {
00234                         temp[j++] = '\0';
00235                         int k = atoi(temp);             //convert string to integer
00236                         i++; j=0; 
00237                         switch(task[i-1])
00238                         {
00239                                 case 'f': linear_distance_mm(k*10,0); STOP(); break;    //forward
00240                                 case 'b': linear_distance_mm(k*10,1); STOP(); break;    //reverse
00241                                 case 'r': rotate_angle_deg(k,0); STOP(); break;                 //right turn
00242                                 case 'l': rotate_angle_deg(k,1); STOP(); break;                 //left turn
00243                                 default: STOP(); break;                                                                 //stop
00244                         }
00245                 }
00246         }
00247         STOP();
00248 }
